name: What is DevOps
description: DevOps combines development and operations practices to improve software delivery. It's a key methodology in cloud engineering.

learning_steps.title: What is DevOps
learning_steps.description: Understand how DevOps combines development and operations practices to improve software delivery and reliability.

learning_steps.title: What is DevOps?
learning_steps.description: Learn about the culture, practices, and tools that make up DevOps.

questions.prompt: How would you describe DevOps to a team that's never heard of it, and why does it matter for modern software delivery?
scenario_seeds: Leadership asks why Dev and Ops teams should work together instead of staying separate
A traditional IT team wants to understand what changes if they 'adopt DevOps'
A developer complains about slow releases and asks how other companies ship faster
questions.grading_rubric: Must explain DevOps as the combination of development and operations practices AND emphasize it's a culture shift not just tools AND explain at least 3 benefits (faster delivery, reliability, collaboration, feedback loops).

questions.prompt: Walk me through what CI/CD means and why it's a core DevOps practice.
scenario_seeds: A developer asks why they should set up automated pipelines instead of deploying manually
Your team's releases keep breaking production and management wants to know how CI/CD helps
A new hire wants to understand how code goes from their laptop to production
questions.grading_rubric: Must define both CI (Continuous Integration) and CD (Continuous Delivery/Deployment) AND explain the pipeline stages (build, test, deploy) AND articulate why automation improves quality and speed.

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what DevOps is and why it matters?
Can you quiz me on how DevOps relates to cloud engineering?
Can you ask me what CI/CD stands for at a high level?

learning_objectives.text: Know key DevOps concepts like CI/CD and automation
